title: Trump takes his antics back to NBC as host of SNL on Nov. 7
text:
Trump takes his antics back to NBC as host of SNL on Nov. 7 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
While NBC won't let Donald Trump host Celebrity Apprentice anymore, they network is OK with him guest hosting Saturday Night Live. He previo...
